refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the LOS percentage for all regions found in the given group.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The relos sets the LOS value for all regions found under the given assembly to the inputted value. If a region is given, it will set the LOS for just that region.

example.title: Set the LOS to 50.
example.para: All regions under example.c will have their LOS value reset to 50.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
